column4: Microsoft raises dividend  plans $40 billion share buyback
column5: Microsoft Corp on Tuesday raised its quarterly dividend by 8 percent and said it would buy back up to $40 billion as part of a new share repurchase program.

column4: Microsoft launches $40 billion buyback program  raises dividend
column5: Sept 20 Microsoft Corp said on Tuesday it would buy back up to $40 billion as a part of a new share repurchase program and raised its dividend by 8 percent.

column4: BRIEF-Microsoft announces quarterly dividend increase and share repurchase program
column5: * Microsoft announces quarterly dividend increase and share repurchase program
